title: Automatic fire dampers shall be provided at the inlet of the fresh air duct and the re-turn air duct
clause_text: Automatic fire dampers shall be provided at the inlet of the fresh air duct and the re-turn air duct of each compartment on every

source_pdf.text_snippet: Automatic fire dampers shall be provided at the inlet of the fresh air duct and the re-turn air duct of each compartment on every
